CustomField.description: NICC-023846 This field is used by Partner Community Users to indicate the name of the Account related to the Subscription Transaction record. This may be different than the account that is in the "Related Account" field
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used by Partner Community Users to indicate the name of the Account related to the Subscription Transaction record. This may be different than the account that is in the "Related Account" field
CustomField.label: Related Account (Partner Updated)
